# Configuration 

```{r}
here::i_am("grades_lab.Rproj")
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(vroom)
```
# Introduction

## Question 1

```{r}
grades <- vroom(here("data", "grades (2).csv"))
```

# Simple analyses

## Question 2

```{r}
cat(paste("The data set contains", num_grades, "grades."))
```

## Question 3

```{r}
num_students <- grades |>
  distinct (id) |>
  nrow()
cat(paste("The data set contains", num_students, "students."))
```
# Question 4

```{r}
students <- grades |>
  distinct(id, group) |>
  arrange(id)
students |>
  slice (1:5) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
